DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.
Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.
Whenever you draw this card, draw one card.
Whenever you play this card, lose 1 durability. When it reaches 0, remove this card from your deck.
You can only carry trinkets of a total weight lower than 10.
Illusory cards are exhausted when you play them, or at the end of your turn.
When you draw this card, put a random card other than this one from your hand on the top of your draw pile.
When you draw or play this card, it is replaced by a random Shifting trinket
